text: The Jaliya Koli (also spelled as Jalia Koli, Jolia Koli and Joliya Koli) is a clan (Gotra) of the Koli caste found in the Indian state of Gujarat and the Union Territory of Daman and Diu and nearby areas. Jalia Kolis ruled over Dahewan village in Gujarat and last Koli ruler from Jalia Kolis was Jalim Jalia. == See more == *Koli rebellion *Koli clans and titles *Koli clans of Gujarat *Koli dance *Koli pirates == References == Category:Koli clans
title: Jaliya Koli
